Plot: A farming family's business is threatened by an unexpected crisis, further testing the relationship between a father and his rebellious son.
Title: At Any Price
Actors: Dennis Quaid, Kim Dickens, Aaron B. Oduber, Jacob R. Oduber
tomatoConsensus: At Any Price features a terrific performance from Dennis Quaid, and it offers further evidence of Ramin Bahrani's unique eye for detail, but film is weighted down by an overly melodramatic story.
